name: Single filer at low income
description: Standard case for single person earning €25,000 in the Netherlands 2026

sources.description: Calculated using official 2026 Dutch tax rates. Tax: 35.75% × €25,000 = €8,938. General credit: €3,115 (full, income < €29,736). Labour credit: €996 + 31.009% × (€25,000 - €11,965) = €5,038. Total credits: €8,153. Tax after credits: €784.
